data.enText: not successful
lack of success in doing or achieving sth

data.chText: 这项计划的成败取决于你。
data.enText: The success or failure of the plan depends on you.
The attempt was doomed to failure .

data.chText: 我的一切努力最后都无济于事。
data.enText: All my efforts ended in failure .

data.chText: 经济失败和失业人数增加这些问题
data.enText: the problems of economic failure and increasing unemployment

data.chText: 她还在努力适应婚姻失败的事实。
data.enText: She is still coming to terms with the failure of her marriage.
a person or thing that is not successful
The whole thing was a complete failure.
He was a failure as a teacher.
not doing sth
an act of not doing sth, especially sth that you are expected to do

data.chText: 联合国未能维持粮食供应
data.enText: the failure of the United Nations to maintain food supplies

data.chText: 不遵守规章制度将被起诉。
data.enText: Failure to comply with the regulations will result in prosecution.
of machine/part of body
the state of not working correctly or as expected; an occasion when this happens
patients suffering from heart/kidney, etc. failure

data.chText: 电源故障使一切陷入黑暗。
data.enText: A power failure plunged everything into darkness.

data.chText: 撞车事故的原因被认定是发动机故障。
data.enText: The cause of the crash was given as engine failure.
of business
a situation in which a business has to close because it is not successful
of crop/harvest
a situation in which crops do not grow correctly and do not produce food

simple_means.memory_skill: fail 失败 + ure 行为，行为的结果 → 失败

ex.chText: 他们的行动以失败而告终。
她觉得在别人眼中自己是个失败的人。
ex.enText: She felt she was a failure in the others' eyes.

ex.chText: 他的竞选活动完全失败。
ex.enText: His election campaign was a complete failure.

synonyms.bx: 指做某事时未能达成目标，也可指不成功的人或事。

d: 失败；失败的人，失败的事

ex.chText: 指挥官承认此次战役失败了。
ex.enText: The commander admitted defeat in the battle.

synonyms.bx: 多指在与某一方的对抗中所遭遇的失败，如在战争、比赛、竞选等中的失利，也可泛指未能做成某事。

ex.chText: 他第一次试镜彻底失败。
ex.enText: His first audition was a fiasco.

ex.chText: 他希望女朋友做的晚饭不会完全无法下咽。
ex.enText: He hoped that the supper his girlfriend made would not be a fiasco.

synonyms.bx: 指让人十分难堪或失望的彻底失败。

ex.chText: 小说的失败让作者非常沮丧。
ex.enText: The flop of the novel discouraged the writer.

ex.chText: 单调的对白使这部电影一败涂地。
ex.enText: The monotonous dialogue made the film a complete flop.

synonyms.bx: 指不受欢迎的产品、电影、戏剧等。

ex.zh: 彻底的失败（者）；完全未做到

example: he resented my failure to return his call
the mechanic's failure to check the brakes
his failure to pass the test

tr: an event that does not accomplish its intended purpose
example: the surprise party was a complete failure

tr: a person with a record of failing
loss of ability to function normally

example: he felt that his entire life had been a failure
that year there was a crop failure

tr: inability to discharge all your debts as they come due
example: the company had to declare bankruptcy
fraudulent loans led to the failure of many banks

value.def: Failure is a lack of success in doing or achieving something, especially in relation to a particular activity.

example.ex: This policy is doomed to failure...
Three attempts on the British 200-metre record also ended in failure.
example.tran: 对英国 200 米纪录发起的3 次冲击也均以失败而告终。

value.def: If something is a failure, it is not a success.

example.ex: The marriage was a failure and they both wanted to be free of it...
example.tran: 他们的婚姻很失败，两人都想摆脱它。

example.ex: His six-year transition programme has by no means been a complete failure.
example.tran: 他的六年转型计划绝没有彻底失败。

value.def: If you say that someone is a failure, you mean that they have not succeeded in a particular activity, or that they are unsuccessful at everything they do.

example.ex: Elgar received many honors and much acclaim and yet he often considered himself a failure...
example.tran: 人们对埃尔加赞誉有加，但他却常觉得自己是个失败者。

example.ex: I just felt I had been a failure in my personal life.
example.tran: 我就是觉得我的个人生活很失败。

value.def: Your failure to do a particular thing is the fact that you do not do it, even though you were expected to do it.

example.ex: She accused the Foreign Office of disgraceful failure to support British citizens arrested overseas.
example.tran: 她指责说，外交部未能给在海外被捕的英国公民提供支持是可耻的。

example.ex: ...their failure to get the product mix right.
example.tran: 他们没有把产品组合弄对

value.def: If there is a failure of something, for example a machine or part of the body, it goes wrong and stops working or developing properly.

example.ex: There were also several accidents mainly caused by engine failures on take-off...
example.tran: 还有几次事故主要是起飞时引擎出现故障造成的。

example.ex: He was being treated for kidney failure...
example.tran: 他因肾衰竭正在接受治疗。

example.ex: Researchers found an almost total crop failure and a severe shortage of drinking water.
example.tran: 研究者们发现作物几乎颗粒无收，并且饮用水严重短缺。

value.tran: (机器的)故障，失灵;(身体机能的)衰竭

value.def: If there is a failure of a business or bank, it is no longer able to continue operating.

example.tran: 上个月倒闭公司的数量上升了 16％。

value.def: If you say that someone has a failure of a particular quality or ability, you mean that they do not have enough of it.

example.ex: There is, too, a simple failure of imagination...
example.tran: 还有，就是纯粹缺乏想象力。

example.ex: He remained on his knees for a long time afterwards, ashamed by his failure of nerve.
example.tran: 他后来在地上跪了很久，为自己缺乏胆量而感到羞耻。

trans: 失败
心力衰竭
肾衰竭；腎衰竭；肾功能损害；慢性肾衰；肾功能衰竭
失效机理；破坏机制；故障结构；破坏机理；失效机制

失效分析；破坏分析；故障分析

成与败；成功与失败；成功与失败态度；成功和失败；成功和失败事件
慢性肾功能衰竭；慢性肾衰竭；慢性肾功能不全；为慢性肾功能衰竭；慢性肾衰
市场失灵；市场失效
充血性心脏衰竭；心力衰竭；心衰；充血性心力衰竭；充血性心衰
急性呼吸衰竭；呼吸衰竭；呼衰；呼吸衰竭症；呼吸功能衰竭
失效概率；破坏概率；无故障概率
(电缆损坏等原因造成的)电路中断，断电
疲劳断裂；疲劳失效
故障诊断
系统故障；系统错误；系统失败；整个系统的失败；系统失效
破坏准则；失效判定标准；衰坏判据；破坏判别准则
肾衰竭
设备失效；设备故障；設備故障；设备失灵

rootsaffixes.indicate: = err, to deceive 错误；欺骗
rootsaffixes.title: fall, fail, fals, fault

partsOfSpeech.dec: de 加强 + fault 错误；欺骗 → 重大欺骗 → 违约
fail 错误；欺骗 + ing 行为的产物 → 错误之处 → 缺点
fail 错误；欺骗 + ure 行为 → 错误状态 → 失败
fall 错误；欺骗 + acious 有…性质的 → 犯错误的
fall 错误；欺骗 + acy 表情况 → 错误；谬论
fall 错误；欺骗 + ible 能…的 → 能出错误的 → 易错的
false 错误 + hood 表性质 → 虚伪；错误
fals 错误；欺骗 + ification 形成… → 伪造；曲解
fals 错误；欺骗 + ify 使 → 篡改；欺骗
fault 错误；欺骗 + less 无…的 → 无错误的，无缺点的
fault 错误；欺骗 + y …的 → 有错误的，有缺点的
in 无 + fallible 易错的 → 无可指责的
un 不，无，没有 + failing 缺点，短处 → 不会出错的 → （永远）可靠的
partsOfSpeech.d: 经久不衰的；（永远）可靠的

rootsaffixes.indicate: 表名词，“行为，行为的结果，与行为有关之物”
rootsaffixes.title: -ure, -ture, -ature, -iture

partsOfSpeech.dec: cens 审查；判断 + ure 行为，行为的结果，与行为有关之物 → 责难
close 关闭 + ure 行为，行为的结果，与行为有关之物 → 关闭
compose 使平静 + ure 行为，行为的结果，与行为有关之物 → 镇定，沉着
con 共同 + ject 扔 + ure 行为，行为的结果，与行为有关之物 → 共同抛出自己的假想 → 推测
divest 剥夺 + iture 行为，行为的结果，与行为有关之物 → 剥夺
expend 花费 + iture 行为，行为的结果，与行为有关之物 → 支出
fail 失败 + ure 行为，行为的结果，与行为有关之物 → 失败
flex 弯曲 + ure 行为，行为的结果，与行为有关之物 → 弯曲
fract 破碎，打碎 + ure 行为，行为的结果，与行为有关之物 → 骨折；断裂
mini 小 + ature 行为，行为的结果，与行为有关之物 → 小画像；缩影
mix 混合 + ture 行为，行为的结果，与行为有关之物 → 混合物
press 压 + ure 行为，行为的结果，与行为有关之物 → 压力
script 写 + ure 行为，行为的结果，与行为有关之物 → 经文；文稿
sign 签字 + ature 行为，行为的结果，与行为有关之物 → 签名
tort 扭曲 + ure 行为 → 酷刑；折磨
